title: Authors and Citation
text: Aviral Goel. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Goel (2023). rastr: R AST Processing Framework. R package version 0.1, http://aviral.io/rastr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rastr: An R AST Processing Framework},   author = {Aviral Goel},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1},   url = {http://aviral.io/rastr/}, }

title: An R AST Processing Framework
text: rastr library manipulating R code.

title: An R AST Processing Framework
text: rastr active development. install directly GitHub.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("aviralg/rastr")

title: An R AST Processing Framework
text: encounter issue feature request please open issue GitHub.

what: Create and query aexpr nodes — doc_aexpr
title: Create and query aexpr nodes — doc_aexpr
text: aexpr_ann_get() returns ann node aexpr aexpr_expr_get() returns expr node aexpr

title: Create and query aexpr nodes — doc_aexpr
code: aexpr_new(ast, ann, expr)  aexpr_ann_get(ast, node)  aexpr_expr_get(ast, node)

title: Create and query aexpr nodes — doc_aexpr
text: ast AST object. node aexpr node.

what: Create and query args nodes — doc_args
title: Create and query args nodes — doc_args
text: args_len_get() returns len node args args_seq_get() returns child nodes list args_get() returns child node position index

title: Create and query args nodes — doc_args
code: args_new(ast, seq)  args_len_get(ast, node)  args_seq_get(ast, node)  args_get(ast, node, index)

title: Create and query args nodes — doc_args
text: ast AST object. node args node. `index` one-based index child node

title: Create and query beg nodes — doc_beg
text: beg_bom_get() returns bom node beg beg_loc_get() returns loc node beg

title: Create and query beg nodes — doc_beg
code: beg_type(ast, node)  beg_bom_get(ast, node)  beg_loc_get(ast, node)

title: Create and query beg nodes — doc_beg
text: ast AST object. node beg node.
